EmailTemplate.description: Email template when a lead is changed to verified status - Lead Seeker program
EmailTemplate.name: Lead Seeker - Lead Status Verified
EmailTemplate.subject: Seeker Rewards Program – Lead verified {!Lead.Lead_Number__c} for {!Lead.Company}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.First_Name_Formula__c},
Congratulations, your lead has been confirmed as a new business opportunity and you’ve been awarded 100 points!
Our sales team appreciate your fantastic support, and is working hard to progress this opportunity. We’ll keep you posted with any important updates. Of course, if it turns into a ‘win’, you’ll receive more points.
In the meantime, why not check out the amazing range of rewards on offer? And keep those fantastic leads coming so you can build up your points balance and redeem your favourite rewards.
Regards, The Seeker Team
